Name: COM Component - Register/Unregister
Description: Use RegAsm registers your .NET assembly to be COM-viewable.

Parameters.Name: DllFilePaths
Parameters.Label: DllFilePaths
Parameters.HelpText: A list of dll paths separated by ;

Parameters.Name: IncludeCodePath
Parameters.Label: Include /codepath parameter
Parameters.HelpText: If true, will include /codepath option to regasm.

Parameters.Name: Version
Parameters.Label: .NET Framework Version to Use
Parameters.HelpText: V2 will use %windir%\framework\v2.*\regasm.exe, V4 will use %windir%\framework\v2.*\regasm.exe

Parameters.Name: IsFramework64
Parameters.Label: Use Framework64 Folder?
Parameters.HelpText: Specifies if %windir%\Microsoft.NET\Framework or \Framework64 should be used.

Parameters.Name: Uninstall
Parameters.Label: Un-register
Parameters.HelpText: Set this to true to run with /u flag to un-register
